pr_title: finer grained synchronization for classloading of agent classes

timeline.message: finer grained synchronization for classloading of agent classes

timeline.bodyText: Nice. Didn't know about this one.
timeline.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: I'm tempted to do it at package level though. What do you think?
replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: Is it to try to avoid entries in the parallelLockMap?
replies.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: yes, exactly, we already have the package names in InternalJarURLHandler and we could probably just key the locks against those. Fewer strings, smaller map, negligible or zero size increase over what we already have.
replies.author: richardstartin
